sense.def:
To exhibit an ability or feeling
pomeni kazati neko sposobnost ali čustvo, tako da to drugi jasno vidijo;

seg.quote: He still exhibited signs of stress.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
exhibited
, je postavljeno na javen prostor, kjer si ga ljudje lahko ogledajo.

seg.quote: The paintings are exhibited in chronological sequence.

sense.def:
An exhibit
je nekaj, kar je razstavljeno v muzeju ali umetnostni galeriji.

seg.quote: Our local museum has over a thousand exhibits.

sense.def:
An exhibit
je tudi nekaj, kar kažejo na sodišču kot dokaz.

seg.quote: Exhibit number two is a diary belonging to the accused.
